oauth.description: OAuth configuration (scaffold; provider wiring not implemented yet)

proxy.description: Local proxy configuration (scaffold; used by startProxy() programmatic API)

apiBase.description: Upstream base URL to proxy to (e.g. https://example.com/api).

proxyAuthToken.description: Auth token required on ALL local proxy requests. If unset, the programmatic startProxy() API generates an ephemeral token.

maxRequestUsd.description: Reject requests whose estimated cost exceeds this USD value.

dailyBudgetUsd.description: Reject requests once total estimated spend for the current UTC day exceeds this USD value.

allowlistModels.description: If set, only these model IDs are allowed (e.g. 'openai/gpt-4o-mini').

denylistModels.description: If set, these model IDs are blocked (e.g. 'anthropic/claude-opus-4').

allowUnknownCost.description: Allow requests when cost cannot be estimated (unknown model).
